about.summary: A fast, flexible machine learning library, written in C++, that aims to provide fast, extensible implementations of cutting-edge machine learning algorithms.  See also Curtin et al. (2018) <doi:10.21105/joss.00726>.

name: r-mlpack
raw_recipe:
{% set version = "3.4.2.1" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-mlpack
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/mlpack_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/mlpack/mlpack_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 7975055ed33ab156475db0b67261ed64462ada07129f27bf8c39595c9954173b

build:
  merge_build_host: true  # [win]
  skip: true  # [r_base == "3.6"]
  number: 1

  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}              # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_c') }}        # [win]
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}            # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_cxx') }}      # [win]
    - {{ posix }}filesystem        # [win]
    - {{ posix }}make
    - {{ posix }}sed               # [win]
    - {{ posix }}coreutils         # [win]
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]

  host:
    - llvm-openmp                  # [osx]
    - r-base
    - r-bh >=1.58
    - r-rcpp >=0.12.12
    - r-rcpparmadillo >=0.8.400.0
    - r-rcppensmallen >=0.2.10.0
    - libblas
    - libgomp      # [linux]
    - liblapack

  run:
    - r-base
    - {{ native }}gcc-libs         # [win]
    #- r-bh >=1.58
    - r-rcpp >=0.12.12
    - r-rcpparmadillo >=0.8.400.0
    - r-rcppensmallen >=0.2.10.0

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('mlpack')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('mlpack')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://www.mlpack.org/doc/mlpack-3.4.2/r_documentation.html, https://github.com/mlpack/mlpack

  license: BSD-3-Clause
  summary: A fast, flexible machine learning library, written in C++, that aims to provide fast, extensible implementations of cutting-edge machine learning algorithms.  See also Curtin et al. (2018) <doi:10.21105/joss.00726>.

  license_family: BSD
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/BSD_3_clause
    - LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - coatless
    - eddelbuettel
    - rcurtin
    - zoq
    - Yashwants19

about.summary: A fast, flexible machine learning library, written in C++, that aims to provide fast, extensible implementations of cutting-edge machine learning algorithms.  See also Curtin et al. (2018) <doi:10.21105/joss.00726>.
